attributes.action: Change Benefit payments for Asylum Seekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Asylum Seekers should only get benefit payments in the form of vouchers or prepaid cards that can only be spent on food & clothes. This will stop Asylum Seekers using this country to send money back to their homeland to buy property etc. We are paying taxes to boost their failing corrupt Governments.
